infos.value: Well, isn't this a surprise!? I thought he was all talk.
I see. Now I understand why Oelde was holding this one back...
Killing him would be such a waste.
Begging for your life already? Don't hide behind your soldiers! Come out and fight!
Once I've felled you, I must head for Wezette.
I'll never forgive him for what he's done!
Poor cub was abandoned by his daddy, wasn't he?
